title: got teemo from hextech crafting
body: Today i  got teemo from the hextech crating system when i rerolled 3 champion shards but i was planning on never buying teemo. can some rioter remove teemo from the game and if thats not possible at least from my account.

replies.body: Hit us up in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) and we can look at your specific issue.  We may be able to remove Teemo from the account, but no refunds would be provided for this.  We'll respond to your ticket as soon as we can!
